item.title: Windshield Wipers – High Speed – Both Inoperative

numlitem.para: Both low speed functions are operative, and
Aircraft is not operated in known or forecast precipitation of moderate or greater intensity within 5 statute miles of the airport of departure or intended landing.
Operation in precipitation of moderate or greater intensity with 5 statute miles of the airport of takeoff or intended landing are prohibited.

placard.para: Placard on Anti-Ice Rain Removal Panel (P5): "CAPT’s and F/O’s HIGH SPD WINDSHIELD WIPER(S) INOP". Enter item in Aircraft Deferred Item Log.
